Download
For download use the SourceForge project page.

This direct link starts the download of the command line version immediately.

An rpm package is usually available at http://www.jpackage.org some time after the SF release.

Below is an icon for Autojar in different formats and sizes. It has been created from components of the Gnome icon set Yasis, which is under the GPL.

png-Format, 48x48 png-Format, 32x32 png-Format, 16x16
ico-Format, 48x48 ico-Format, 32x32 ico-Format, 16x16
